channel.title: Database on Quick Reference
channel.description: Recent content in Database on Quick Reference

item.title: RA (Relational Algebra) - Complete Reference
item.description: Comprehensive guide to relational algebra operations with conditions, examples, and detailed explanations covering unary operations, joins, and set theory operations.

item.title: DDL (Data Definition Language) - Complete Guide
item.description: Comprehensive guide on DDL commands in SQL, including database creation, table structure definition, constraints, and foreign keys.

item.title: Django: Day 3
item.description: Learn Django Models and database concepts including model creation, fields, migrations, and database configuration. Essential guide for working with Django's ORM system.

item.title: Django: Day 2
item.description: Learn Django Models and database concepts including model creation, fields, migrations, and database configuration. Essential guide for working with Django's ORM system.
